Title: Relates to the admissibility into evidence of statements in learned treatises, periodicals, or pamphlets
Summary: Permits the admissibility into evidence of statements in learned treatises, periodicals, or pamphlets if the statement is called to the attention of an expert witness and the publication is established as a reliable authority by the expert's admission or testimony, by another expert's testimony, or by judicial notice.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the admissibility of statements in learned treatises, periodicals, or pamphlets
